content:
I have a bunch of example resources in my IG, one of them is a document Bundle. Right now I have to copy several of the other example resources into the Bundle, since the content is duplicated I run the risk of the two copies of the resources diverging. Is there a way to build an example Bundle such that the referenced resources are slurped into the Bundle during the build so that I only need to maintain one copy?

I seem to recall that FSH has this capability, but I'm not sure, and I don't recall seeing it for non FSH IGs.
no support for this at this time though it's on my wishlist
Elliot Silver has marked this topic as resolved.

Elliot Silver said:

I seem to recall that FSH has this capability, but I'm not sure, and I don't recall seeing it for non FSH IGs.

you can fish the resources into your bundle, very convenient feature of FSH, see example in MHD ex-ProvideBundles1.fsh
Unfortunately, the IG isn't FSH though. Oh well.
